meanings.definition: The state of being extended in length or duration.
meanings.sent1: The extendednesses of the bridge allowed for safe passage over the river.
meanings.sent2: The extendednesses of the movie made it feel like it would never end.
meanings.sent3: The extendednesses of the meeting caused everyone to doze off.
meanings.sent4: The extendednesses of the road trip seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The extendednesses of the snake startled the hikers on the trail.

meanings.definition: The quality of being stretched out or prolonged.
meanings.sent1: The fabric's extendednesses made it perfect for making curtains.
meanings.sent2: The extendednesses of the elastic band allowed it to stretch without breaking.
meanings.sent3: The extendednesses of the joke made everyone laugh for a long time.
meanings.sent4: The extendednesses of the shadow in the sunset created a beautiful silhouette.
meanings.sent5: The extendednesses of the yawn indicated how tired she was.

meanings.definition: The act of expanding or enlarging in scope or range.
meanings.sent1: The extendednesses of the company's operations reached new markets.
meanings.sent2: The extendednesses of the garden provided space for various plants to grow.
meanings.sent3: The extendednesses of the balloon made it impossible to fit through the door.
meanings.sent4: The extendednesses of the internet allows us to connect with people worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The extendednesses of the map showed all the hiking trails in the area.
